Package local.intranet.tombola

Class TombolaApplication

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.support.SpringBootServletInitializer
local.intranet.tombola.TombolaApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.web.WebApplicationInitializer
@SpringBootApplication @EnableJpaRepositories @EnableAutoConfiguration @EnableRedisHttpSession(maxInactiveIntervalInSeconds=120, cleanupCron="0 */5 * * * *", redisNamespace="spring:session:tombola") public class TombolaApplication extends org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.support.SpringBootServletInitializer implements org.springframework.web.WebApplicationInitializer
TombolaApplication extends SpringBootServletInitializer for Tombola API that it uses controllers in local.intranet.tombola.api.controller and early services in local.intranet.tombola.api.service

Security and configuration is defined in SecurityConfig and ApplicationConfig

Redis is configured in RedisConfig

For JdbcHttpSession:

@EnableJdbcHttpSession(maxInactiveIntervalInSeconds = 120, cleanupCron = ..)

Author:
Radek KÃ¡dner
